extendedInfo.description: Manage your jam-packed life and keep the whole family in the loop with Cozi, Appy Award Winner for Best Family App and named #1 "must-have app for a better life" by The TODAY Show. **Sign up before September 12 and get the Back to School Goodie Bag with more than $100 in savings from family-friendly brands like ChicoBag, See Kai Run, Zulily, Brenthaven and more!*** Cozi makes your mobile device the ultimate family organizer with a shared calendar, shopping lists, to do lists and a journal the whole family can access on the go.  FAMILY CALENDARâ¢ An easy to use color-coded calendar, view an individual's schedule or the whole family at onceâ¢ Add or edit appointments that everyone in the family can seeâ¢ Set reminders so no one misses soccer practice or an important eventâ¢ Get an agenda for the upcoming week sent by email to any family memberSHOPPING LISTSâ¢ Shared grocery lists the whole family can access â¢ Retrieve lists when you're at the store and quickly cross off items or add new ones while you shopâ¢ See items added by other family members when you're on the go, no more coming home with everything but the one thing you really neededTO DO LISTSâ¢ Create a shared to do list, a honey do list or chore checklists for the kidsâ¢ Have your to do items right there in your pocket to remind yourself or send them to a family member to remind them â¢ Create as many lists as you want - to do lists are a great place to keep planning checklists like packing lists, the kids camp list, emergency supplies and moreFAMILY JOURNALâ¢ Jot down a special moment and add a photo all while you're on the moveâ¢ Cozi's journal is designed especially for busy moms and dads, so it's quick and easy to keep favorite memories you don't want to forgetWIDGETSHome screen widgets give you quick access to your family calendar, shopping lists and to do lists. Choose from small and large widget sizes to customize your at-a-glance view.PLUSâ¢ Your Cozi calendar, shopping lists, to do lists and family journal are accessible from your mobile phone or tablet as well as from any computer by visiting cozi.com.â¢ The web version of Cozi also includes additional features like a meal planner and recipe box. â¢ No matter where or how you and your family sign in to Cozi, you'll always be looking at the same information. â¢ The whole family shares one account that everyone can access using their own email address (as specified in Settings) and the shared family password.â¢ Cozi is available for all kinds of phones and tablets. Just search for "Cozi" in your favorite mobile app store.â¢ International users please note: This is the U.S. version of Cozi Family Organizer and not all features may function as expected. RAVE REVIEWSSee why everyone from Family Circle to Real Simple to Parenting to Working Mother Magazine is raving about Cozi.â¢ Appy Award Winner for Best Family/Parenting Appâ¢ Voted #1 "Practical" Android App for Moms âBabbleâ¢ "An online calendar we love." âParents Magazineâ¢ "Cozi is, in short, ridiculously handy." âPC World â¢ "Cozi just works." âThe Wall Street Journalâ¢ "The only FlyLady approved application." âThe FlyLadyâ¢ "Too good to be true." âFamily Fun Magazine â¢ "Incredibly helpful." âBetter Homes and GardensNOTE: If you experience any problems with your Cozi app, please don't hesitate to CONTACT US directly at cozi.com/support. We're unable to help if you only leave a comment in the app store. Our support team is top notch and we want to help you!

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: I LOVE this app. Well worth the gold subscription. And I can sync it to my Outlook calendar. This is by far the best app I own. I can\'t live without it. And the customer service is the best around. Thank you!!!
reviews.author: Gina Jorgenson

reviews.comment: Definitely useful. I do with that the calendar widget could scroll and it might be useful to be able to sync with the phone calendar and google calendar. A photo album function would also be very useful!
reviews.author: Wei-San Mondie

reviews.title: Keeps us organized.
reviews.comment: This sure beats the calendar hanging on the fridge and the shopping list notepad. Works well and I love the way each person\'s appointments is color-coded.
reviews.author: Ngan MacDonald

reviews.title: Best app ever
reviews.comment: My wife and I keep our family schedule straight with this app. No complaints except for the added ads. We\'ve been using this for close to 2 years.
reviews.author: Jacob Hill

reviews.title: Very Flexible :-)
reviews.comment: Cozi has been a tremendous help in keeping the family on the same page. School activit\303\251s, Doctor visits, Birthdays, Family events, etc. WELL worth the subscription in Gold!!! :-) I recommend it to everyone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App!!
reviews.comment: Been using 2+ yrs. We have a blended family. Without this app I doubt we would keep up with each child\'s activities, each family\'s events and custody days.
reviews.author: JM Lews

reviews.title: I LOVE this calendar!!
reviews.comment: With 6 different schedules to keep track of this has made it so much easier to keep track of who\'s going where and when!
reviews.author: Maureen Thompson

reviews.title: Best family app out there
reviews.comment: This app single handedly keeps my whole family organizer. It works on everything from the computer to iPod to phones... Everyone of us can be updated in real time as to what everyone is doing. I can know where my family is at all times ..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung Notes II
reviews.comment: Very positive outcome with our calendar and shopping list that we needed mostly. Thanks to COZI for this wonderful app!
reviews.author: Jo Ellen Granaas

reviews.title: Life Organizer!!
reviews.comment: Absolutely love the Cozi app! Helps me to keep track of not only my schedule but everyone in the family. A definite must have for a family full of busy schedules.
reviews.author: Jennifer Kruizenga

reviews.title: Good family sharing app
reviews.comment: Very nice app. Would have given 5 but it is slow for updates at times. It should have speed and slickness of any.do
reviews.author: Nimish M

reviews.title: Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Widget doesn\'t always update and dissappears
reviews.author: Adam Lopez

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: Great help for our family\'s busy lifestyle, thank you Cozi.
reviews.author: Juan Reyes

reviews.title: The Best Thing to Happen to Our Family
reviews.comment: We\'ve been Cozi users for a few years now and I can say this app is a true gem. For a busy family this app is a must to stay on top of things and the team is consistently making it even better. Well worth the subscription!
reviews.author: David McClenning

reviews.title: A real big help
reviews.comment: Cozi is excellent, it\'s calendar, to do and check lists are so useful in organising a family. The fact that it is cross platform helps no end. And the journal feature is the icing on the cake. I thank you for this excellent service and wish you all the best in future development.  Thanks again
reviews.author: Sherali W

reviews.title: Best family calendar app!
reviews.comment: I use the cozi calendar daily. It helps my husband and my kids keep track of our busy schedule. I love that anyone of us can add to it whenever we need to. I always know my teenage sons schedule, which is a miracle! We also use it for grocery shopping, when someone runs out of something, they add it to the shopping list and I pick it up while I\'m at the store! Lifesaver!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love it. It helps me stay organized
reviews.author: Mary Klueck

reviews.title: Really like this app!
reviews.comment: Great for keeping track of our family schedules.
reviews.author: jaime fuxan

reviews.title: Nice, but not great
reviews.comment: The app is nice and simple. And the personal colored dots are nice. But... why would you make an app that only allows you to get notifications for one family member. It\'s one thing to input them into a calendar, but unless you look at your calendar several times a day, you could miss something really important with this app. As a busy mom, having a great notification tool is important to me.
reviews.author: Kisha Allender

reviews.title: I can\'t live without it!
reviews.comment: My husband also has this app. When something comes up that he needs to know about, this app will notify him. He can add to the shopping list if he runs out of something. To-do lists for both of us. Calendar will notify either of us when an appt is coming up. All syncs to website for free. I like printing my calendar to put up on fridge. VERY customizable, easy to use. I recommend paying the $4.99 a month for the gold option, not a necessity, but has some nice extras.
reviews.author: Meredith Overton
